Refer a friend and earn Rs.25 as bonus amount and use it for playing the contest and convert the bonus amount as real cash after winning. Your friend will get Rs.25 as bonus amount when he/she will install MyIndia11 application using your link and referral code given below.
First select a match from the available upcoming match list to get started to play your first game on MyIndia11 and win the cash prizes.
Create your team and select your best 11 players from the list choose captain who will get 2x points and vice captain who will get 1.5x points.
Join a league of selected match and start winning the cash.
On MYINDIA11, you can simply create your fantasy team based on a real life match to score maximum points and win exciting cash prizes worth millions.
Lots of players have won cash prizes on MYINDIA11 and you can also win big. There are different kinds of cash contests available, each with its own entry fee and winning cash prizes.

Adding money to your MYINDIA11 wallet is simple and safe. We ensure the security of our customers credentials and we do not disclose any information of users. We only ask and store the customers bank details to credit the winning amount directly to users bank account and that is also secured with us.
NOTE: If in a run out more than 2 players involved then the point will be awarded to only last two players who have touched the ball.
Update the current version of the MYINDIA11 with new version for better user experience and to use added new features.
By registering, you accept you are 18+ and agree to our T&C and Privacy Policy
Enter the email associated with your account and we will send an email with a verification code to reset your password.
Did not receive the email? Check your spam, or try resend OTP.
Your new password must be different from previous used password.
Enter your email address associated with the account and we will send an email with a link to change your password. Follow the instructions given in email to reset your password and create a new one.
1. In case of if your prediction and your opponent prediction are same as result then you will get your entry fee back in your wallet.
3. Make sure before clicking CONFIRM button on Prediction page that you have selected your desired team.
4. Once you have clicked on CONFIRM button you will not be able to change your prediction option.
5. You will be able to join the Toss Prediction contest before the 2 minute of Actual Toss Happening.
6. In case if any contest does not have the required number of participants and you have joined that league then you will get you entry fee amount credited back to your wallet after the match starts.
2. In case if your prediction is same as result and none of your opponent has the same prediction then you will get the money same as prize pool for the winner.
